item.title: Similarity Measurement in Image Retrieval
item.description: In image retrieval or other similarity-based task such as person re-identification, we need to compute the similarity(or distance) between the our query image and the database images. Then we can rank the database images according to their similarity to the query image. In this post, I want to briefly introduce 2 measures widely used in image retrieval tasks.
